main event: A bright white glow with a white trail was observed moving from north to south and fading from view in Green Bay, Wisconsin.
interesting points: The object changed color from bright white to bluish white and back to white.
The object moved slowly at an estimated speed of 50 mph.
The object appeared to be larger than a star and much brighter.
The object seemed to descend slightly towards the end of the sighting.
No sound was heard from the object.
sighted object: bright white glow with white trail
